com.m2ps.interchange

Class IsoMessageProcessor

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jpos.util.Log
      • com.m2ps.interchange.IsoMessageProcessor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.jpos.core.Configurable, org.jpos.iso.ISORequestListener, org.jpos.iso.ISOResponseListener, org.jpos.util.LogSource

    public class IsoMessageProcessor
extends org.jpos.util.Log
implements org.jpos.iso.ISORequestListener, org.jpos.iso.ISOResponseListener, org.jpos.core.Configurable
    This class provides basic message processor (interchange) functionality. It processes request message received as well as response messages.

      • performRequestTranslation

        public void performRequestTranslation(org.jpos.iso.ISOMsg request,
                             org.jpos.iso.ISOMsg translatedRequest)
                               throws org.jpos.iso.ISOException,
                                      java.io.IOException
        This function performs translation of a request message from one zone to another.
        Parameters:
        request - This is the input or source message. i.e. The translation function will use this as the reference when translating.
        translatedRequest - This is the output of the translation operation. The translatedRequest will be the final output of the request translation.
        Throws:
        org.jpos.iso.ISOException
        java.io.IOException

      • performResponseTranslation

        public void performResponseTranslation(org.jpos.iso.ISOMsg response,
                              org.jpos.iso.ISOMsg translatedResponse)
                                throws org.jpos.iso.ISOException
        This function performs translation of a response message from one zone to another.
        Parameters:
        response - This is the input or source message. i.e. The translation function will use this as the reference when translating.
        translatedResponse - This is the output of the translation operation. The translatedResponse will be the final output of the response translation.
        Throws:
        org.jpos.iso.ISOException

      • expired

        public void expired(java.lang.Object handBack)
        This function is called when a response is not received timeously for a given request. The default implementation does nothing
        Specified by:
        expired in interface org.jpos.iso.ISOResponseListener
        Parameters:
        handBack - The object that is associated with this timeout.
        See Also:
        ISOResponseListener.expired(java.lang.Object)
